# Nais Tap

Distributing nais client apps via [Homebrew](https://brew.sh/).
Primarily this tap is for MacOS users, but some formulas may work on Linux as well.

## How do I install these formulae?

`brew install nais/tap/<formula>`

Or `brew tap nais/tap` and then `brew install <formula>`.

## Documentation

`brew help`, `man brew` or check [Homebrew's documentation](https://docs.brew.sh).

## Development

Casks and formulae are managed by the respective repositories that own the code.
Changes must be made in these repositories.

**Do not edit these files in this repository.**

### Casks

Casks are currently managed by:

- [nais/device](https://github.com/nais/device/tree/main/.github/workflows/templates)

### Formulae

Formulae are currently managed by:

- [nais/cli](https://github.com/nais/cli/tree/main/.github/workflows/templates)
- [nais/narcos](https://github.com/nais/narcos/tree/main/.github/workflows/templates)
